attributes.action: instruct the Department for Health to offer annual health checkups to all N.H.S. patients
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I admit that this would, at least initially, be very expensive but it would save money in the long run by catching any diseases at an early stage thereby making treatment less expensive.  And of course there is the issue of lessening suffering which, in my view, is even more important.  

Not all conditions can be seen by the patient; for instance some years ago I myself had a mole on my back which - naturally - I was unable to see. I  had noticed (felt) a spot higher up but when I asked my G.P. to look at it she was far less concerned about that than about the mole of which I was completely unaware; upon investigation it proved not to be malignant but what stage might it have reached if I hadn't asked my G.P. to look at the spot?  I imagine many people have had similar experiences.
